content: and written instructions instructions are on page 4 and 5 cuff round 1 k2 1 3 work row 1 of jasmine both socks are worked the same pattern k2 1 3 knit to end of round cast on 56 64 72 sts join in the round round 2 k2 1 3 work next row of jasmine being careful not to twist your stitches and pattern k2 1 3 knit to end of round place a bor marker repeat round 2 until you have completed all round 1 k2 p2 repeat to end of round 8 row of the jasmine pattern repeat round 1 14 more times 15 rounds in continue working as established completing total the jasmine pattern 8 times 64 rounds in total leg the pattern is worked on the front of the sock only the back of the sock is worked in plain 2 jasmine socks by debbie ford heel flap 1 3 work row 1 of jasmine pattern k 2 1 3 pm pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from if you are using a contrast colour for the heel the row below and k tbl pick up and k 14 16 start knitting your heel in contrast yarn now 18 sts along your heel flap do not break your main coloured round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog k 2 turn your work so the ws is facing you you 1 3 work next row in jasmine pattern are now going to be working back and forth across the front of sock k 2 1 3 sm ssk k to on the next 28 32 36 sts the remaining 28 end of round 32 36 sts are the front of the sock and will be left unworked for now round 2 k to m sm k 2 1 3 work next row in jasmine pattern across the front of sock k 2 row 1 ws sl1 p 27 31 35 1 3 sm k to end of round row 2 rs sl1 k1 repeat across 28 32 36 repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have sts decreased down to your original stitch count repeat row 1 and 2 13 15 17 more times with 28 32 36 sts on the back of your sock 14 16 18 in total k to m sm this is now your bor and you can then work row 1 once more remove the other st marker as you work the next round heel turn foot row 1 rs sl1 k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn continue working in established pattern until row 2 ws sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn the foot measures 5 cm / 2 inches less than desired foot length i recommend ending row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 st before your last turn having worked row 4 or 8 of the jasmine ssk using 1 st from each side of the gap k1 pattern turn if you are using a
